location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter E from Lt-Col Samuel Hennell, Resident in the Persian Gulf, on the Honourable Company's Sloop of War Cliveat Muscat to Arthur Malet, Chief Secretary to the Government Bombay

mods.abstract: Hennell reports on his meeting with Sheikh Mukhtoom [Maktum bin Butti] of Debaye [Dubai], who is in Muscat to assist in the Imam of Muscat's acquisition of Sohar. Hennell writes that the two men discuss the soon-to-expire Maritime Truce, its effectiveness and possible renewal.
